35-44 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient) $4$5$5$i was first diagnosed '96 with schizo-affective. '99 major dep. Then '06 with bipolar depression. have tried numerous anti-depressants. Celexa 40mg seems to be the most tolerable by my metabolism. very low side effects. the nausea subsided after about 5 or 6 days. before taking my once a day dose in the morning i make sure to eat something to counteract the chance of nausea. my metabolic type is similar to my mother's whom is also on anti-depressants. we were both on zoloft 50mg for about 4 years. and both of us can not tolerate wellbutrin
column3: paxil and especially prozac as they make us very jittery. i was initially started at 20mg once per day taken in the morning. however
column4: i started with 10mg (half dosage) for for one week and upon second week added the other half to achieve full dosage. i am a survivor of two serious suicide attempts and the most important thing i can tell u besides seeking help (which is all around if u just look and ask) is to never
column5: never give up on ur worth as a human being. best wishes and regards.

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient) $5$5$5$"I use to think about dying and death all the time. Couldn't understand why I would swing moods
column3: even a friend of mine commented and ask ""why are you always talking about death and dying? It made me think.  Now I have been on celexa for one year and my life has turned completely around. I don't pay people or their negative comments any attention. Had a compusive order to think about bad situations over and over in my head but now free of those repeated thoughts. Feel like living
column4: not dying. There are those that don't believe in depression or that the symptoms are not real. But I am here to tell you that if I was not on this medication I would not have a job
column5: friends or continued my education. Celexa gives me no side effects at all. I feel there is hope and I have finally really made long term goals. My daughter has recognized the change in me and I realize that this medicine is needed to function properly. Recently have had to increase it because body got immune to same dosage in my case. But it still has that wonderful affect on me. Back to my pleasant self again. After being ashamed to admit the problems in my life God has created a medicine to help those that truly need it.People love being around me now ....can't get rid of them!!(smile)."
